findAndBook: Search and book flights to your favorite destinations. Compare prices and find the best deals.
discoverWorld: Discover the world's most breathtaking destinations with Tourtastic's premium travel experiences. Your journey to tranquility begins here.
weProvide: We provide exceptional travel services tailored to your needs. Discover why thousands of travelers choose us for their journeys.
exploreHundreds: Explore hundreds of destinations across all continents with our extensive network of airline partners.
bookWithConfidence: Book with confidence using our secure payment system and receive instant confirmation.
customerSupport: Our customer support team is available around the clock to assist you with any inquiries.
discoverMostSought: Discover our most sought-after destinations that travelers love.
stayUpdated: Stay updated with our latest offers, travel tips, and exclusive deals.
privacyRespect: We respect your privacy. Unsubscribe at any time.
howToBook: How do I book a flight?
howToBookAnswer: You can book a flight by using our search feature, selecting your preferred flight, and following the booking process. Make sure you have your passenger details and payment information ready.
cancelBookingAnswer: Yes, you can cancel your booking according to our cancellation policy. The refund amount will depend on how far in advance you cancel and the type of ticket you purchased.
paymentMethods: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethodsAnswer: We accept major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers.
refundProcess: How long does the refund process take?
refundProcessAnswer: Refunds typically take 5-10 business days to process, depending on your payment method and bank.
createAccount: How do I create an account?
createAccountAnswer: Click on the 'Register' button in the top right corner and fill in your details. You'll receive a confirmation email to verify your account.
forgotPasswordQuestion: I forgot my password. What should I do?
forgotPasswordAnswer: Click on the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page. You'll receive an email with instructions to reset your password.
bookingProcessDesc: Our booking process is designed to be simple and secure. All bookings are confirmed instantly upon successful payment. You will receive a confirmation email with your booking details.
paymentPolicy1: Full payment is required to confirm your booking
paymentPolicy2: We accept major credit cards and secure online payment methods
paymentPolicy3: All prices are displayed in your chosen currency
cancellationPolicy1: Free cancellation up to 24 hours after booking
cancellationPolicy2: Cancellations made 72 hours before departure: 80% refund
cancellationPolicy3: Cancellations made 48 hours before departure: 50% refund
cancellationPolicy4: Cancellations made less than 48 hours before departure: no refund
modificationsDesc: Changes to existing bookings are subject to availability and may incur additional charges. Please contact our support team for assistance with modifications.
informationCollectionDesc: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:
useUpdates: Send important updates about your bookings
informationSharingDesc: We may share your information with:
sharePartners: Travel partners to fulfill your booking
shareService: Service providers who assist our operations
shareLegal: Legal authorities when required by law
dataSecurityDesc: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, or misuse.
acceptanceDesc: By accessing and using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you may not use our services.
userObligation2: Maintain the security of your account
userObligation3: Comply with all applicable laws and regulations
userObligation4: Not misuse or attempt to manipulate our services
bookingTerm1: All bookings are subject to availability
bookingTerm2: Prices may change without prior notice
bookingTerm3: Booking confirmation is subject to payment
bookingTerm4: Cancellations are subject to our cancellation policy
liabilityDesc: We are not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of our services or any travel arrangements made through our platform.
intellectualPropertyDesc: All content on our platform is protected by intellectual property rights and may not be used without our express permission.
247SupportDesc: Our dedicated support team is available around the clock to assist you with any inquiries or concerns you may have.
phoneSupportDesc: Speak directly with our support team
liveChatDesc: Chat with our support team in real-time
bookingHelpDesc: Get help with your bookings, changes, and cancellations
policiesDesc: Learn about our booking, cancellation, and refund policies
generalQuestionsDesc: Find answers to common questions about our services
contactSupport: Contact our support team for personalized assistance

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Stay updated with your bookings, payments, and special offers.
notifications.markAsReadError: Failed to mark notification as read
notifications.markAllAsReadError: Failed to mark all notifications as read
notifications.emptyDescription: You're all caught up! No notifications to display.

name: Name
footerAbout: Tourtastic is your premium travel partner, offering exceptional flight booking services to destinations around the world.
footerAddress:
123 Travel Street, Suite 100
New York, NY 10001
forgotPasswordIntro: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
resetLinkSent: A password reset link has been sent to your email if it exists in our system.
